title: [1.14.3-1.7.10][Bone Torch——骨制火把]下矿不怕没有木头
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2173204318 于 2019-8-14 17:35 编辑 


Bone Torch
骨制火把(用骨头制成的火把)



The idea behind this mod is very simple. I was traveling thru the nether and ran out of torches. Having just used my last wood to makes chests I was doomed. Or was I? I noticed I had coal and bones in my inventory from kill wither skeletons. This gave me the idea, "Why can't I place coal on a bone". 10 mins later Bone Torches were born from my abomination workshop.Bone + coal -> 4 torchesBone + charcoal -> 4 torches
骨头+煤炭=4*骨制火把骨头+木炭=4*骨制火把像普通火把一样放煤炭/木炭 骨头




DOWNLOAD[无汉化]未获得授权，请原贴下载
下方汉化文件补链https://share.weiyun.com/5reXafj1.13/1.14通用




关于授权
curseforge获取授权中
更新日志2019/8/14 更新1.14.3版本

replies.author: 楚天也楚地
replies.txt_content: 下完mod去了一趟矿洞，没带木头，结果一只小白没找到。

lxmmc 发表于 2019-6-15 18:29
这个算核心类mod吗
谢谢指出 已经修改

replies.author: PrinceAO
replies.txt_content: 哈哈 有时候骨头比木头值钱 然而地下骷髅刷的还是没有僵尸多
